title: Happy Birthday, Honoka-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Uuugh~, it’s sooo hot~, I’m melting~.... Hmm? Something’s coming....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>HONOKAAAAA!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>That’s Mari-san’s voice.... Is it from that helicopter!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Honokaaa~! Happy birthday~! I’m here to pick you up~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Mari-saaan~! Pick me up? Where to?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>You must be burning up, so I’m inviting you to a summer resort~! We can swim and fish in the clear waters of the forest~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeeh!? That’s amazing! I’ll get ready right away!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>We’ll have a barbecue tonight!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I’m staying the night there!? Awesome–!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Let’s also do a test of courage after our barbeque—!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yaaay—!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
